titles.title: Zzz's to A's Resolution
Expressing the sense of the Congress that secondary schools should begin the school day no earlier than 9:00 in the morning.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 7/31/2009--Introduced. Zzz's to A's Resolution - Expresses the sense of Congress that secondary schools should begin the school day no earlier than 9:00 a.m.
